TopicTitle: Game freezes for two minutes. Any ideas?

Articles.Content:
Recently when I am entering the game from the main menu, loading up a craft from the VAB (it will spawn on the launch site and run for a few seconds then freeze), and exiting the game; I get about a 2-3 minute game freeze. I only have two medium sized vessels in orbit (one in orbit of Kerbin and one in orbit Dres and no debris in orbit). I’m not sure that this is a bug because this has just started. This didn’t happen when I first bought the game so I don’t think it has to do with my computer setup. Any idea on what is causing the freeze?

Edited February 27, 2023 by Sivako Aerospace
Clarification

I would  restart a new game, erase de save games) it can easily be one of the current problems with loading saves. I had to do that when all  my saves started to laod with the  kerbal outside the ship.
Sounds like it might be a bug, and so, moved to Bug Reports.
